alert.note: Alert for Eastern Clay; Inland St. Johns; South Central Duval; Trout River (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 09 at 9:42AM EDT until April 10 at 11:00PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM EDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Northeast winds 15 to 20 mph with gusts up to 35 mph expected. * WHERE...Inland St. Johns, Eastern Clay, Trout River and South Central Duval Counties. * WHEN...Until 11 PM EDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strongest wind gusts will be along the St. Johns River Banks.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Clay; Inland St. Johns; South Central Duval; Trout River
